entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24895: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #261
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24897: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #260
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24936: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #259
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-28260: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #258
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-29331: .NET Denial of Service vulnerability #257
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-32032: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #255
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33126: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #254
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33128: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #253
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33135: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #252

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FrameworkList.xml generated in libraries build for live ref pack does not include source generators #87582
  • [API Proposal]: Determine if one directory path is under another #87581
  • Dependencies isolation bug in AssemblyLoadContext #87578
  • [API Proposal]: Streaming APIs for the `System.Net.Http.Json` extensions #87577
  • [Mono] Issues to prevent SIMD registers from being enabled on Arm64 #87576
    Future
  • [EnC] CoreCLR assertion in System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdateTest.TestGenericAddStaticField #87574
    8.0.0
  • TLS handshake fails on HttpClient, but works on WebRequest #87571
  • [API Proposal]: BCL additions to support C# 12's "Collection Literals" feature. #87569
    8.0.0
  • System.Uri considers all email addresses in same domain as equal #87564
  • Move to zlib-ng for better CPU intrinsics support (ARM64 performance) #87560
  • [HTTP/3] H3_FRAME_UNEXPECTED in stress tests #87559
    8.0.0
  • [browser][nodejs][MT] Worker script or module filename must be an absolute path or a relative path #87556
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Support decomposition into WithElement/GetElement in physical promotion #87554
  • Client authorization with HttpClient fails unless the client cert is installed in windows cert store #87561
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87552
  • Crash when `GetHashCode` is called under specific circumstances #87551
  • Parallel.For performance degrades significantly after 2.14 billion milliseconds of system uptime #87543
  • if using System.Numerics.Vector.IsHardwareAccelerated return false but the code into if statement #87537

Closed

  • Failure in checked/release asm diffs pipeline #87432
    8.0.0
  • SYSLIB1051: Runtime Marshalling must be disabled only shows up in command line builds, not in Visual Studio #84739
    8.0.0
  • [browser][debugger] chrome failing to start #86166
  • [API Proposal]: Add StringMarshalling property to GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute #84662
    8.0.0
  • JsonNode? control = JsonNode.Parse(json) => System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #70785
    Future
  • string.Format throws FormatException on Mac Catalyst/ARM64 #87277
    8.0.0
  • QuicConnection not being released after exception #87291
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows #86852
    Future
  • Unable to load assemblies using SDK 7.0.202 but worked on SDK 7.0.201 #83526
    7.0.x
  • EventPipe failures in Native AOT #87505
    8.0.0
  • GetILFunctionBody fails in dotnet 7 for dynamic methods with CORPROF_E_DATAINCOMPLETE #86577
    8.0.0
  • Cannot debug Blazor .net 8 WASM app #87491
  • Deserialize interfaces using System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer #87538
  • Where is the `ServiceBase.CanHandleSessionChangeEvent` ? #83450
    8.0.0
  • Frame not in module when hitting a breakpoint in Blazor WASM #86754
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add DOTNET_JitDisasmWithCodeBytes #87580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix missing assemblyref for typeref only kept for debug info in illink #87575
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2201091 #87570
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add helix retries for debugger tests #87565
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • add zero byte read to SslStream #87563
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make the soure generator format enums using their identifiers rather than numeric values. #87557
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix concurrency issues with publishing transfomed imethod #87555
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Logging middleware #87550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [browser][MT] fix library tests #87549
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support last-use copy omission for commas #87548
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix jitdump issues introduced by #85801 #87547
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] CI: Fix EAT/AOT tests build #87546
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Don't use `_WasmDevel=true` when publishing #87544
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Extend Task.FromResult default task optimization to 16 byte unmanaged types #87541
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Testing CI #87536
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix struct passing on reflection calls #87535
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Remove a couple of asserts, which are no longer valid, from getMaxVectorTByteLength #87504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typo in object.h #87553
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a warning. #87573
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-ios
  • Fix StrictlyBlittable check to work for "source Compilation" references. #87507
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Handle a null operation type (for example if the null literal is being cast/assigned to a ComImport interface type). #87566
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking
  • [browser][debugger][MT] Make operations on dictionary thread-safe follow-up #87474
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] permission denied when reading a jitdump file #87427
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #87524
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #87523
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-staging] [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #87428
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [Mono] Update Mono build README.md #87517
    documentation
  • [mono][jit] Disable passing SIMD args in SIMD regs on arm64. #87540
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Allow bigger json parsing to JsonDocument #87343
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add delay load hook for singlefilehost and enable delay load of version.dll #87495
    area-Single-File
  • [QUIC] Fix rooted connection when hanshake failed #87328
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (1/n) #87510
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix GetILFunctionBody for dynamic methods #87530
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Moved a test using external server to outerloop #87476
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove test exclusions for Json tests #87457
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Unify error handling path for replay and asmdiffs #87464
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Generate fewer GenericMethodHashtable entries #87466
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix DependencyContext splitting on semi-colon #87518
    area-DependencyModel

Updated

  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Tar: Ensure trailing separator in sanitized path for extraction #87534
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Report warnings for COM interfaces with instance properties or events #87492
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Restore removed API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • Remove some unnecessary Substrings #87479
    area-Meta
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't set mark array bits for UOH objects during concurrent marking #87533
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Performance improvements for Random.Shuffle() #83305
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [hot reload][mono] Implement support for adding static and instance fields to generic classes #87285
    area-EnC-mono
  • Expose AVX512 Compare and BlendVariable APIs #87404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wip][nativeaot][tests] Add smoke runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS #87260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.8
  • fix(66900): Adding test for confirm bug fix. #87167
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` remove code conditionally for `WasmBuildNative` #87170
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • throw SocketException for Quic transport errors #87208
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] make cwraps more conditional #87274
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Don't update downlevel runtime packs when producing prerelease version #87281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for induced field accesses in physical promotion #87410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][IGNORE] debugging WBT failure #87531
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Perf optimization of module scanning for generic cycle detection #87532
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet format 7.0.304 fails when resolving types from COM references #33260
  • .NET 8.0.0-preview.5.23280.1 and Entity Framework Core can't read appsettings.js during migration #33259
  • `dotnet tool install` needs a `--force` switch #33246
  • Secrets Management in different Environments #33241
  • Error `dotnet new blazorserver BlazorTestApp --no-https -f net7.0` on Windows 11 WSL Ubuntu #33232
  • Native container support does not respect system proxy settings #33230

Closed

  • Regression using dotnet format when upgrading from 7.0.203 to 7.0.302 #32598
  • Fix error code to maintain consistency #33196
  • How different workload versions can be installed side by side? #33245

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33257
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't set UseApphost or SelfContained to true for PublishAot #33229
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Fix R2R map generation on OSX #33225
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

Merged

  • Fix duplicate NETSDK1183 #33228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #33216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow MSBuild to use BinaryFormatter #33227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33222
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #33212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #33209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #33213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #33215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Prefer spans over interfaces in overload resolution #7276

PullRequests

Updated

  • Clarify how *ref-safe-to-escape*/*safe-to-escape* are calculated for inline array operations. #7272

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `FieldAttributes.NotSerialized` has been marked obsolete #68626
  • Pull members up in roslyn LSP #68621
  • Using primary constructors reports erroneous NRT warnings in some cases. #68616
  • False positive IDE0059 with anonymous types #68611
  • Escape scope analysis won't work with primary constructors #68610

Closed

  • Go-to definition doesn't work anymore on project references #68472
  • [BUG] cannot rename symbols across projects #68593
    Preview 1.1
  • `[MaybeNull]` does not work for parameters #68609
  • C# Interactive UnauthorizedAccessException #68606
  • IDE0060 (remove unused parameter) reported for primary constructor parameters. #68501
  • Incorrect IDE0045 simplified if expression #68578

PullRequests

Created

  • VisualStudioProjectFactory: import the solution service once instead … #68630
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress formatter-based serialization warnings in MetadataWriter #68627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in ArrayBuilder.AddMany #68625
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #68623
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Use primary constructors in the 'Features' layer. #68622
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update references to constant fields in parameter initializers when moving to primary constructors. #68620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Convert xml references when moving to primary constructors #68615
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in MergedNamespaceSymbol.SlowGetChildNames #68614
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Address a prototype comment #68613
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • NPM packaging improvements, shared dependencies #68603
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Adjust edit span for LSP completion when triggered in the middle of a word #68624
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Prevent `EditAndContinueFeedbackDiagnosticFileProvider` from throwing an exception in Razor scenarios #68619
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve collection literal parsing #68561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert 68576 #68618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' in the presence of directives #68612
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to newer CodeStyle, dotnet-format and compiler toolset NuGet packages #68608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use GetContainingLineNumber() to reduce allocations #68605
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issues with 'use conditional' when using pattern variables #68604
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [17.6] Ignore source generator diagnostics outside compilation #68488
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactor BindExtensionMethod method and add some assertions #68599
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, 17.5
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • EnC: Stop reporting CS7101 on runtime that supports generic updates #68601
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update API remarks for RoutingEndpointConventionBuilderExtensions.RequireHost to warn about host spoofing #48818
  • BlazorWasm benchmarks broken #48815
  • AmbiguousMatchException when using "{controller}.aspx" route template #48813
  • Allow empty WebApplicationBuilder to be created without default behavior #48811
  • Blazor WebAssembly: Prerendering As Static Files and Rehydration #48810
    Backlog
  • ProblemDetails are not returned when an application is started via a WebApplicationFactory (i.e in an integration test) #48809
  • GetAuthenticationStateAsync was called before SetAuthenticationState. #48806
  • VS 2022. ASP.NET Core with Angular. Opening multiple ng serve consoles when ClientApp fails #48805
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Swagger ui's example value/scheme doesn't respect JsonConverters #48802
  • Basic implementation of signalR when hosted on azure failing to connect with negotiation #48800
  • The Blazor Server application runs significantly slower when using the HttpSys server #48799
  • Server header value customization #48798
  • Hot reload / dotnet watch not fully working in .NET 8 preview 5 #48796
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #48794
  • RenderModeServer doesn't work when applied to App component #48793
    8.0-preview6

Closed

  • Blazor NavLink component is active on wrong path #48627
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #48749
  • Cannot inherit ComplexObjectModelBinder #48673
  • Provide out of the box Identity Manager UI #47648
  • WebHostOptions default ShutdownTimeout does not match HostOptions default ShutdownTimeout #48605
    8.0-preview6
  • ./restore.cmd problem #48420
  • Bug still exists in latest .NET 8 Preview 4 #48712

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Blazor WebAssembly Benchmarks #48820
    area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • [skip-ci] Add missing xml docs for ExceptionHandler #48814
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Improve GetAuthenticationStateAsync exception message #48812
    area-runtime, area-blazor
  • Add complex form binding support to RDF #48790
    area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • Add server option for seamless reconnect #48789
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Fixes #48627 NavLink component is active on wrong path #48718
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Unify JSON handling across RDF and RDG #48573
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview6
  • Bump Polly to 7.2.4 #48795
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Make test template more explicit about helix logs #48740
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Update ITlsHandshakeFeature.HostName API + misc. improvements in HttpSys calls #48788
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • [skip-ci]Add links to video for contribution guidelines #48647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Update WebHostOptions.ShutdownTimeout to 30 seconds #48606
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting, 8.0-preview6
  • Move SignalR connection start telemetry to transport start #48753
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview6
  • Revert SDK update #48787
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add `IRazorComponentsBuilder.AddWebAssemblyComponents()` #48664
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Proof of concept for extending http logging #48679
    area-runtime
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • Fix F# MVC template #48600
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove route and method tags from rate limiting #48707
    area-runtime, area-middleware
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Implement IHostApplicationBuilder on WebApplicationBuilder #48775
    area-runtime, area-hosting

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove NewsstandKit Dependency to build targeting iOS17 #15660
  • Updating shell Tab title doesn't work via Hot Reload / code behind #15659
  • Oppo's system overrides the app's font and in place uses the system set font. #15654
  • Updating a ControlTemplate at runtime causes it to disappear. #15649
    Backlog
  • On Android, Maui Blazor app can't play HTML5 video when source comes from an IFileProvider #15647
    Backlog
  • Proposal for Enhanced Splash Screen Functionality in MAUI for iOS #15637
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query:Test add functional test coverage for #30557 #31080
  • I use ExecuteUpdateAsync to update data, but it seems that the generated SQL statement has a problem #31078

Closed

  • Navigation expression doesn't work in user defined function #30557
    8.0.0
  • Issue/PR 30,000! Let's celebrate! #30000
    Discussions
  • Add-Migration InitialCreate #31008
  • Unable to project a collection inside a JSON column with EF Core 7 #31010
  • Clear error messages when scaffolding with customized T4 #31005
  • MsgPack for Json Serialization #30980
  • How to extend EF Core to conditionally modify Select, Insert and Update expressions for certain tables? #30977
  • AsNoTracking() and Include() not working as expected #31079

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix navigation in UserDefinedFunction #30776
  • Code cleanup & modernization #31077
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31075
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
